content: STI ETF Stocks ETF Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 05 Mar 2019STI Index vs S&P 500 - what are the advantages and disadv between the 2? hearing alot of talk about S&P 500 and looking to invest 20k, but not too keen to deal with another currency...1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 05 Mar 2019STI index advantage is local currency if you live in Singapore and no withholding tax. Disadvantages are subpar performances, low diversification at only 30 companies and  too much portion of the holdings are on the banking industry at around 40% (DBS, OCBC, UOB).0 comments0
